tool_description: API that generates a name, slogan and idea for a business
name: Business Starter API
title: Business Starter API

api_list.name: Businessplan
api_list.description: Generate a Businessplan for your idea

test_endpoint.idea: Opening a Dog Grooming SalonExecutive Summary Pawsitively Groomed is a dog grooming salon located in Miami, Florida Our mission is to offer high quality professional grooming services and products to pet owners in the community Our services include a full-service bath, nail trimming, ear cleaning, hair trimming and styling, teeth brushing, and specialty services such as creative painting We also offer retail products and pet accessories Pawsitively Groomed will employ experienced groomers and provide exceptional customer service for our clientsCompany Description Pawsitively Groomed is a newly established business that will be located in Miami, Florida The shop will provide full-service

api_list.name: Business Idea
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://business-starter-api.p.rapidapi.com/idea"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "business-starter-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

test_endpoint.message: You have exceeded the rate limit per minute for your plan, BASIC, by the API provider
